name: quickwikieditor
description: Edittool for Wikipediaauthors. Tool for simply and fast edit little textsniplets without need of reloading or leaving the site.
author: Michael F. Sch√∂nitzer

preferences.name: hotkey
preferences.title: Hotkey
preferences.description: Key-combination to start editor. Allowed modifiers: shift, alt, meta, control & accel. Restart required.

preferences.name: summary
preferences.title: Editsummery
preferences.description: The editsummery to give for the edits. Leave _AUTO_ for automatically generated summary

preferences.name: minor
preferences.title: Mark edits as minor
preferences.description: Should the edits done with this tool as minor edits?
